name: 箱庭小相撲
description:
This is a sumo wrestling simulation game. The Hakoniwa Sumo Kyokai will be held in the computer you are using now, and you will be able to play Grand Sumo Tournament six times a year.
Also you will be able to play the tournament called Gachinko Cup once every four years.
You will be the master of the room and warmly watch over the disciples.
